fish.name: Bluegill
fish.subtitle: Lepomis macrochirus

image.alt: Bluegill - a small fish and the first one to get a sprite.

fish.flavor: bluegills are a pretty common fish. though their gills aren't /that/ blue, they're surprisingly colorful.

fish.name: Pumpkinseed
fish.subtitle: Lepomis gibbosus

image.alt: Pumpkinseed - this is literally a bluegill reskin

fish.flavor: pumpkinseeds are apparently "pumpkin seed shaped", but this one looks pretty fish shaped. maybe there's a more pumpkin seed shaped one out there...

fish.name: Smallmouth Bass
fish.subtitle: Micropterus dolomieu

image.alt: a green fish with a white body

fish.flavor: smallmouth bass are a very popular fish among fishermen. their dedicated article on wikipedia doesn't talk about their mouth once.
